verbose_text: The frequency distribution of MCMV specific CX3CR1 int and CX3CR1 hi Tmem cells differed in C57BL/6 mice compared to Cx3cr1 +/gfp+ mice (XREF_SUPPLEMENTARY C), likely reflecting the transient surface expression of CX3CR1 on C57BL/6 mice and the sustained fluorescence of GFP (half-life> 24 hr), which is unaffected by CX3CR1 internalization.
